page.title: 02ESKDALEMUIR IN THE 1980's
page.content: What is it like to live in Eskdalemuir in the 1980's ? For the long established residents who have their roots firmly in the land it is home, the place of their forefathers , changed now ,but still meaningful. "I wouldn't want to change. I couldn't live without the hills of Eskdalemuir ",says one."I was born here ,as was my father and grandfather . i shall hope to die here",says another. For the city or surburban folk retired to country cottages ,Eskdalemuir is peace and quiet;time to read ,to fish ,to enjoy nature, to study archaeology , to become a valued part of a local community, to have a new identity.
